metadata.title: CVE-2018-19497 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In The Sleuth Kit (TSK) through 4.6.4, hfs_cat_traverse in tsk/fs/hfs.cdoes not properly determine when a key length is too large, which allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (SEGV on unknown address with READmemory access in a tsk_getu16 call in hfs_dir_open_meta_cb intsk/fs/hfs_dent.c).

criterions.comment: sleuthkit package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
